【now.com體育】57歲的紐卡素領隊賓尼迪斯表示深愛教波，希望仿效水晶宮主帥鶴臣，一直教到70歲！

賓尼迪斯（Rafael Benitez）帶領華倫西亞贏過西甲，亦曾在利物浦拿下歐聯及英足盃，之後更教過國際米蘭、車路士、皇家馬德里、拿玻里這些一級大球會。可是，他近年的氣勢大不如前，現時的紐卡素僅屬英超護級分子。

不過，57歲的肥賓自言對教波仍然有熱情：「我希望教到70歲，因為我愛足球的熱情，愛我的工作。你可以看到不少領隊都教了很多年，以那份對勝利的渴求，我看不到自己過正常人的生活。」紐卡素於周日英超作客水晶宮，對方領隊鶴臣已70歲，正正是肥賓的榜樣。

一路走來有起有跌，肥賓不諱言曾經想過退休，而太太及女兒都同樣：「當她們看到我在廚房用杯杯碟碟排出4-4-2陣式時，就會說『回去教波吧！』不過，最重要是健康，要是你健康，就可以繼續，我慶幸自己的身體不錯，不煙不酒。」

SWANSEA CITY HAVE BEEN DEALT A DOUBLE INJURY BLOW WITH LEROY FER AND WILFRIED BONY BOTH RULED OUT FOR THE REST OF THE PREMIER LEAGUE SEASON.

Fer was stretchered off in the first half of the Swans’ 1-1 draw at Leicester City on Saturday after going down unchallenged.

A scan confirmed the Dutch midfielder had ruptured his Achilles and he is now expected to undergo surgery.

The same fate also awaits Bony after a scan revealed the striker had torn his anterior cruciate ligament.

The Ivory Coast international suffered the knee injury when he landed awkwardly just moments after coming on as a second-half substitute at the King Power Stadium.

Despite battling on to help secure the Swans a precious point in their survival fight, Bony left the stadium in a knee brace.

Both players will be assessed further in the week and an update will follow.

Everyone at the Swans wishes both players speedy recoveries.

對我地而言都算係半個好消息嘅

Jose Mourinho has insisted Newcastle United will not be relegated this season.

The Manchester United boss is preparing his side for Sunday’s Premier League encounter at St James’ Park and feels that Rafa Benitez’s team have more than enough about them to survive this term.

Newcastle could start the game in the relegation zone if results don’t go their way on Saturday, but Mourinho said before the clash: “They are a big club!

“I believe, I believe.

“I am not the person to say why because what I know from the club is an incredible army of fans, a city that lives for the club and supports the club.”

And the former Real Madrid and Chelsea manager feels that United’s big-club pedigree will help them stay in the top flight - especially with Rafa Benitez at the helm.

“Benitez another example. So it’s difficult to understand.

“But if you ask me if I think if Newcastle are going to be in the Championship next season.

“I say immediately no way.

“I think they know how to get the points to stay in the Premier League.”

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

“It’s true. I think it’s the only stadium in the Premier League [where I have such a bad record],” Mourinho said ahead of Sunday’s trip to St James’ Park.

“Also Huddersfield, but Huddersfield we played there only once. I think it’s difficult, honestly.

“I always felt beautiful matches at St James’ Park, but difficult matches. I like to go there. I like the feeling of going to Mr Robson’s home. I like that feeling.

“I like the stadium, I think the stadium is really nice. I like the atmosphere. They are a good, enthusiastic crowd. I like the Geordies and I like to go there.

“But I couldn’t win - I lost and drew a few times, but didn’t win. I hope the result is different but I know that the characteristics of the game are not going to be different.

“I think they are a good team. I think they had a very good transfer window with Kenedy and [Islam] Slimani. They are two players I know very well and they can really improve the team.



摩佬真係從來唔會講紐記壞話
